segments.text: I can’t believe how much water is just gushing out of that sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing in it like it’s nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the floor—it’s going to be ruined by the time she notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she’s none the wiser.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll get mad when she finally sees the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach those cookies, and that stool is not stable at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the water splashing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a strange mix of calm and chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt before she turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is going to be a disaster soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
